Html:
Based on the last check in date (12/5/10, almost two months ago) I assume the Warlock model is currently not being maintained, is that correct? I know it's not working, just thought I'd see if people are working on it or not. I'm getting tired of reforging
 everything at least once and sometimes twice every time I get a gear upgrade, just to squeak out the maximum hit-capped haste I can. Sadly, I know no programming languages. I could maybe help with the math, but I suspect it's a little more time-consuming than
 I have time to do (hence why I'm wanting the program)
